text.section:
When a court imposes a fine, the court may order the defendant to pay the fine:
When the court imposes sentence; or
In specified installments at designated intervals.

section.section: If a fine is payable in installments, the court may order that the payments be made to a probation agency or officer.
The probation agency or officer shall report to the court a failure to comply with the order.

text.section: If a court sentences a defendant to probation, the court may make payment of a fine a condition of the sentence.
